Title: VCS Revert Fails with 404
Description: Reverting a commit via the API returns a 404 Not Found error.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a table and commit change.
2. Send POST request to /api/vcs/rollback with valid commitId.
Expected Behavior: Rolling back or reverting should create a new revert commit.
Observed Behavior: API returns 404 Not Found (Target commit not found error potentially).

Title: VCS Branch Isolation Failure
Description: Commits made on a feature branch are visible in the main branch history.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create and switch to 'dev-branch'.
2. Make a commit.
3. Switch back to 'main'.
4. Query commit history of 'main'.
Expected Behavior: Main branch history should NOT show commits from 'dev-branch' until merged.
Observed Behavior: Dev branch commit was found in Main branch history.

Title: AI API 500 Error without Keys
Description: The AI SQL generation endpoint fails with a 500 error when no API keys are configured
Steps to Reproduce: instead of using the fallback logic.
Expected Behavior:
1. Ensure no API keys (GEMINI, OPENAI, etc.) are set in .env.
2. POST to /api/ai/generate-sql with a prompt.
Observed Behavior: The API should return a fallback response explaining that keys are missing and providing a template.
